layout.name: usePhysicalBounds
layout.title: Use Physical Boundaries
layout.tooltip: If set, this room will have "solid" walls and a death plane if there isn't an adjacent room.

layout.name: actAsSpawnZone
layout.title: Act as Spawn Zone
layout.tooltip:
If set, any NPC's inside will be spawned when the player is in the room,
regardless of if they are on camera.

layout.name: resetWhenEntered
layout.title: Reset Level When Entered
layout.tooltip: If set, most of the level will be reset (similar to when respawning) when this room is entered.

layout.name: tags
layout.title: Tags
layout.tooltip:
A list of "tags" that can be used by lua code to identify the room.
Should be separated by a comma, quotation marks are not necessary.
